solid #000}}@media only screen and (min-width:40.625rem){.list-newsletter{border-bottom:0}}.horizontal-rule-mobile{display:none}.horizontal-rule-tablet{display:none}@media only screen and (min-width:40.625rem){.horizontal-rule-tablet{clear:both;border:0;display:block;width:100%;margin:1rem 0 0}}@media only screen and (min-width:61.25rem){.feed-grid{padding-left:2.5rem;padding-right:2.5rem}}.grid-simple-item{clear:both;margin:1.25rem 0}@media only screen and   </head>
  <body class="locale-it homepage">
   <header class="marquee bg-image lazyload lazyload-in-view homepage-marquee only-marquee">
    <div class="marquee-overlay">
    </div>
    <div class="marquee-inner">
     <div class="marquee-content">
      <h1 class="marquee-logo">
       <a class="marquee-logo-link" href="/it/">
        <svg viewbox="0 0 737 266" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
         <g fill="#1A1918" fill-rule="nonzero">
          <path d="M270.846594 262.241196h-12.781228V4.13170093h19.900923V.72342056h-71.276302v3.40828037h19.863724V262.241196h-19.863724v3.366019h113.300107v-69.622393h-3.357738c-.726601 45.943421-19.898443 66.256374-45.785762 66.256374M480.938342 262.241196h-12.74403V4.13170093h19.863725V.72342056h-71.273822v3.40828037h19.858765V262.241196h-19.858765v3.366019h113.300107v-69.622393h-3.357738c-.729081 45.943421-19.898443 66.256374-45.788242 66.256374M59.6612248 262.241196H49.1044362V132.448112h4.5282349c17.6368054 0 27.0206175 18.791533 27.0206175 47.39772h2.993198V79.7552523h-2.993198c0 24.4471407-8.2529933 49.2820937-27.0206175 49.2820937h-4.5282349V4.13170093h13.5078289c21.0342215 0 43.9283419 16.94693457 43.9283419 62.07743927h2.993198V.72342056H.32299664v3.40828037H17.5927819V262.241196H.32299664v3.366019H109.938023v-69.214692h-2.993197c0 48.901739-24.7540206 65.848673-47.2836012 65.848673M733.460594 196.268224c0 48.946486-24.75402 65.853645-47.283601 65.853645h-10.514631V132.323813h4.486078c17.636805 0 27.020617 18.813907 27.020617 47.402692h3.030396V79.6309533h-3.030396c0 24.4521117-8.250513 49.2870657-27.020617 49.2870657h-4.486078V4.02728972h13.465672c21.071419 0 43.930822 16.93201868 43.930822 62.07992528h3.032876V.62149533H626.836285v3.40579439h17.274745V262.121869h-17.274745v3.366019h109.617507v-69.219664h-2.993198">

         </g>
        </svg>
       </a>
      </h1>
     </div>
    </div>
   </header>

     <div class="nav-bar-container">

         TRAVEL TIME DI ELEONORA CARISI
        </a>
       </li>

     </li>

      <div class="full-item-content">
       <a class="full-item-title item-title" href="/it/moda/street-style/a22588526/letizia-ortiz-look-scarpe-zeppe-estate-2018/">
        L'ultimo look di Letizia Ortiz è 100% estate e le sue scarpe saranno il vostro prossimo desiderio
       </a>
       <div class="full-item-dek item-dek">
        <p>
         La Regina indossa il più spagnolo tra i modelli must have dell'estate ed è semplicemente perfetta
        </p>
       </div>

       <div class="byline full-item-byline" itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">

       <a class="item-parent-link full-item-parent-link" href="/it/showbiz/musica/">
        Musica

        30/07/2018
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="full-item-content">
       <a class="full-item-title item-title" href="/it/showbiz/musica/a20063027/fiorella-mannoia-biografia-canzoni-piu-belle/">
        Che sia benedetta Fiorella Mannoia, l'artista che invita a rivendicare il diritto a essere felice
       </a>
       <div class="full-item-dek item-dek">
        <p>
         La sua storia fatta di musica, impegno sociale e solidarietà è d'ispirazione per tutte le donne
         <br/>
        </p>
       </div>

      <div class="collection-breaker-header">
       <a class="collection-breaker-title" href="/it/come-vivere-in-maniera-sostenibile/">
        SPECIALE GREEN --&gt; SALVIAMO LA TERRA!
       </a>
      </div>
      <div class="collection-breaker-items">
       <div class="simple-item collection-breaker-item ">
        <a class="simple-item-image item-image" data-vars-ga-call-to-action="Into the wild" data-vars-ga-position="1" data-vars-ga-total-positions="3" data-vars-ga-ux-element="Collection Breaker" href="/it/moda/tendenze/a20681567/borse-vegane-dove-comprarle/">
         <img alt="moda-sostenibile-design-danese" class="lazyload lazyload-in-view" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/slider-home-1500x630-erik-1526303173.jpg?crop=0.84xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=320:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/slider-home-1500x630-erik-1526303173.jpg?crop=0.84xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:* 480w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/slider-home-1500x630-erik-1526303173.jpg?crop=0.84xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=320:* 650w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/slider-home-1500x630-erik-1526303173.jpg?crop=0.84xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:* 768w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/slider-home-1500x630-erik-1526303173.jpg?crop=0.84xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=320:* 980w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title="Borse design danese"/>
        </a>
        <a class="simple-item-title item-title" data-vars-ga-call-to-action="Into the wild" data-vars-ga-position="1" data-vars-ga-total-positions="3" data-vars-ga-ux-element="Collection Breaker" href="/it/moda/tendenze/a20681567/borse-vegane-dove-comprarle/">
         Into the wild
        </a>
       </div>
       <div class="simple-item collection-breaker-item ">
        <a class="simple-item-image item-image" data-vars-ga-call-to-action='"Ho fatto sesso con un vegano"' data-vars-ga-position="2" data-vars-ga-total-positions="3" data-vars-ga-ux-element="Collection Breaker" href="/it/emozioni/sesso/a21998413/come-fanno-sesso-i-vegani-sex-toys/">

       </a>

        </p>

      </div>
      <div class="full-item-content">
       <a class="full-item-title item-title" href="/it/showbiz/celebrities/a22099862/gigi-hadid-bella-hadid-news/">
        "Non sono gelosa di mia sorella Bella": Gigi Hadid racconta il segreto del loro successo (di coppia)
       </a>
       <div class="full-item-dek item-dek">
        <p>
         In casa Hadid nessuna competizione: solo tanta, tantissima bellezza
        </p>
       </div>
       <!-- shared/byline -->
       <div class="byline full-item-byline" itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
        Di
        <a class="byline-name" data-vars-ga-call-to-action="Federica Caiazzo" data-vars-ga-ux-element="Byline" href="/it/author/17801/federica-caiazzo/" itemprop="name" rel="author">

       </a>

         Spiagge nascoste nei vulcani, granelli a forma di stella e paesaggi geometrici: la natura come non l'avete mai vista

       </a>

      <div class="full-item-content">
       <a class="full-item-title item-title" href="/it/showbiz/gossip/a22571146/michelle-williams-news-matrimonio/">
        Michelle Williams si è sposata in segreto, e questo è ciò che dovete sapere sul suo nuovo amore
       </a>
       <div class="full-item-dek item-dek">
        <p>
         Rinascere dalle ceneri si può (e si deve)
        </p>
       </div>
       <!-- shared/byline -->
       <div class="byline full-item-byline" itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">

       </a>

    ( function( d, Modernizr ) {
 	d.addEventListener( "DOMContentLoaded", function() {
 		var l, h = d.getElementsByTagName( "head" )[ 0 ],
 		f = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/elle/assets/css/homepage.75201a3.css"],
 		m = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/elle/assets/css/homepage-mobile.3791eb6.css"];
 
 		for ( var i = 0, len = f.length; i < len; i++ ) {
 			l = d.createElement( "link" );
 			l.rel = "stylesheet";
 			l.href = Modernizr && Modernizr.mobile ? m[ i ] : f[ i ];
 
 			h.parentNode.insertBefore( l, h );
 		}
 	} );
 } )( document, Modernizr );
   </script>
